text: Home » Videos » Celeb Interview » Varun Dhawan | Alia Bhatt | Badri & Dulhania Ki MIND BLOWING Duniya Varun Dhawan | Alia Bhatt | Badri & Dulhania Ki MIND BLOWING Duniya Faiz Khan Feb 27, 2017 - 2:07 pm IST 0 0 About the video In this Bollywood Hungama exclusive section, Badrinath aka Varun Dhawan and his dulhania Vaidehi aka Alia Bhatt plays a hilarious segment in which both reacts to some crazy hypothetical situations.
